data.title: Verbotene Liebe Characters - Verbotene Liebe Minor Characters, Tanja Von Lahnstein, Christian Mann, Nico Von Lahnstein, Nathalie Kappler (Paperback)
data.meta_description: Please note that the content of this book primarily consists of articles available from Wikipedia or other free sources online. Pages: 66. Chapters: Verbotene Liebe minor characters, Tanja von Lahnstein, Christian Mann, Nico von Lahnstein, Nathalie Kappler, Constantin von Lahnstein, Charlie Schneider, Oliver Sabel, Carla von Lahnstein, Elisabeth von Lahnstein, Adrian Degenhardt, Ansgar von Lahnstein, Jens Kramer, Sebastian von Lahnstein, Maria di Balbi, Jan Brandner, Henning von Anstetten, Clarissa von Anstetten, Lydia von Lahnstein, Arno Brandner, Tristan von Lahnstein, Olivia Schneider, Sylvia Jones, Judith Hagendorf, Matthias Brandner, Julia von Anstetten, Paul Brandner, Andi Fritzsche, Helena von Lahnstein, Katja Brandner, Leonard von Lahnstein, Hannes von Lahnstein, Florian Brandner, Rebecca von Lahnstein, Ludwig von Lahnstein, Cecile de Maron, Gregor Mann, Johannes von Lahnstein, Bernd von Beyenbach, Sarah von Lahnstein, Luise von Waldensteyck, Annegret Wittkamp, Lars Schneider, Fabian Brandner, Jana von Lahnstein, Stella Mann, David Brandner. Excerpt: The following are characters from the German soap opera Verbotene Liebe (Forbidden Love) who are notable for their actions or relationships, but who do not warrant their own articles. Andreas Jung (15 April 1996 to Fall 1996) Benedict "Ben" von Anstetten is the younger brother of Christoph von Anstetten and the first husband of Tanja von Lahnstein. Ben shocks his brother when he returns after twenty years and has Tanja as his new bride on his side. Ben wants to have his inheritance of the Anstetten fortune. As soon as Ben gets his share, he wants to buy Castle Friedenau. Christoph and Ben fight over the holdings until Ben is found dead. Tanja and Ben's illegitimate son Rajan Rai inherit his fortune. While Christoph and Tanja are suspects in Ben's murder, it soon comes out that George Helthay, former Butler of the Anstetten family, killed him, but planned to murder Clarissa von Anstetten.
